short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows to add a color mark to the page depending on environment (devel, staging, production, ...)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool allows you to add a color mark to the web page depending on environment (devel, staging, production, ...). You can even add custom css styles and colors.
